name: Burning Monkey Solitaire 2: Monty Zuma's Revenge
name_original: Burning Monkey Solitaire 2: Monty Zuma's Revenge
description:
Burning Monkey Solitaire 2: Monty Zuma's Revenge is a card game developed by Freeverse Games. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Freeverse Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Burning Monkey Solitaire 2: Monty Zuma's Revenge on PC.
